person_attribute_type.name: ncd.GlobalPatientId
person_attribute_type.description: A global identifier for a patient. To be migrated to an identifier type when matching issues are resolved.

person_attribute_type.name: ncd.PatientInstitutionMedicalRecordId
person_attribute_type.description: An institution-specific medical record id for a patient. Probably to be migrated to an identifier type when matching issues are resolved.

person_attribute_type.name: ncd.ProviderLocalId
person_attribute_type.description: An identifier assigned to a provider by an institution(?)

person_attribute_type.name: ncd.ProviderLocalIdSource
person_attribute_type.description: The HL7 field in which the provider's local id was found.

person_attribute_type.name: ncd.ProviderNameSource
person_attribute_type.description: The HL7 field in which the provider's name was found.
